name: Debian 13
description: Debian 13 (Trixie) Linux is a distribution that emphasizes free software. It supports many hardware platforms

notes.text: VM has no root password set. To login type in user `root` and just press enter
After installation, checkout: ´https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/discussions/836´ for useful Debian commands
If you use Cloud-init, checkout after installation: ´https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/discussions/272´
